item.title: Coding Period: Second Phase Part 2
item.author: Author
item.description: Phase two of GSoC2020 is over, this blog is little late cos my laptop’s HDD died and I was unable to save my Hugo environment. Overall the summer has been really productive and the API design of the interface is finally reached beta period, let’s look at the progress. Final API of the Interface After several weeks of coding, design discussions, and code review, phase 1 of my project which consisted of designing API and all the functionality for the base raster interface is completed.
